original_text:
But if they had stood in my council,
    they would have proclaimed my words to my people
and would have turned them from their evil ways
    and from their evil deeds.
korean_text: 그들이 만일 나의 회의에 참여하였더라면 내 백성에게 내 말을 들려서 그들을 악한 길과 악한 행위에서 돌이키게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: But if they had stood in my council
they would have proclaimed my words to my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성에게 내 말을 선포했을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and would have turned them from their evil ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 그들의 악한 길에서 돌이켰을 것이라
그리고 그들의 악한 행위에서도 돌이켰을 것이라
